entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early this morning and ending near noon then 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
